revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=PL-N12 |revision=A1 (Kit) |asin=B01BY8LFPA;GB;, |est_release_date=06/2016 |is_manuf=No |type=Powerline Access Point |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=CEE 7/16 |pwr_vac=yes |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531 |cpu1_cspeed=560 |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=AR7420 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |flags=HomePlug AV |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=http://ap.asus.com |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wi-Fi HomePlug AV500 Powerline Adapter}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/PL-N12-Kit/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=PL-N12-Kit}}
Sold as part of the ''PL-N12 Kit'' which also includes an [[ASUS PL-E41]] :''300Mbps HomePlug AV500 PowerLine Extender''
The device probably uses [[Atheros]] AR7420 as the HomePlug controller. :Web Management: http://ap.asus.com
This device is not certified by the FCC and is not sold in the US.
